extendedInfo.description: The average adult needs at least four 90-minute sleep cycles for a good night's sleep. Bedtime Calculator as three modes:Wake up at:Determine what time you should go to bed if you need to wake up at a specific time.Go to bed now:If you go to bed now, what time should you wake up?Go to bed at:What time you should wake up if you go to bed at a certain time.Bedtime Calculator Premium has no ads and will receive new features first.Planned features:Reminder notificationsGraph your sleep patternsSoothing sounds to lull you to sleepAlarmThe free version of Bedtime Calculator is still available to try here: https://market.android.com/details?id=com.burk.bedtimeInspired by http://sleepyti.meTags: Sleepytime, sleepyti.me, sleepy time, bedtime, calculator, sleep cycle, circadian rhythm

reviews.title: Excellent little tool
reviews.comment: Use it everyday without fail. Makes waking up early that much easier
reviews.author: Tegan Westra

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Exactly what I needed. Gives me three suggestions about the best time to sleep at based on the time I want to wake up or when to get up based on when I\'m sleeping.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Helpful app, concept works!
reviews.comment: I was skeptical when it said it would calculate a time to fall asleep and not have you feel groggy in the morning but I tried it out when I had to wake up at 4am for work. Woke up feeling refreshed and ready. Used this on several occasions for different wake up times and each time its worked. I like that there are 3 different methods to choose from. Of course you can calculate yourself but save the time for sleep and use this app instead.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Been using the sleepy time website for ages now. Good to know there is an app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: love this app
reviews.comment: a lot of free versions of paid apps include ads - some ads much more annoying than others.   I don\'t know why people complain about such a useful app having \'annoying\' ads, and I wonder why I see much less complaints in the comments of other less useful apps that have more annoying ads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does exactly what its suppose to do. Ease of use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I paid for this version due to promise of new features, none have arrived since I downloaded over 6 months ago. Unhappy and Tired of waiting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does exactly what it says... Nothing more
reviews.comment: I love the concept, but I hate doing any more mental math than is necessary. It would be nice if this app could add that extra 15 minutes of falling asleep, but it doesn\'t. I found another app that does, though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I have insomnia & had sleep deprivation. And so this app helps me to get the proper amount of rest I need. KUDDOS!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So,... add some multiple of 90 minutes to the time you go to sleep. Why would I need an app for that??
reviews.author: Jim Gimpel

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: Its do simple lite and free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: idk I just got it and  its like 2 pm
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not much to it
reviews.comment: Just add 1.5 hour increments to your sleep time.  You can do that math in your head.  Would be better if it could be integrated with an alarm.  I have uninstalled this because it doesn\'t provide that much benefit.
reviews.author: A Google User
